abapSkill.info: Good experience of working on SAP ABAP on HANA, S/4HANA Embedded Analytics. Working on CDS Views (Interface/Consumption, OData services, Annotations) & AMDP procedures
Hands-on experience with developing, maintaining and registering backend OData services in SAP Gateway Service Builder using ABAP, CDS Views, Function Modules.
Experience with BW ABAP related enhancements like Generic Extractors (based on Function Modules, BADIs etc.), Transformation routines, Customer Exits and REST API consumption
